nodes.text: The IG-106 assassin droid was a model of assassin droid line of the IG-series. It resembled the IG-88 assassin droid line and featured a blaster cannon mounted on its right arm.
Around 1 ABY, a spacer acquired a storage device containing a holographic image of an IG-106 droid, which he could use with a holoshroud to disguise himself as an IG-106 droid.
Several IG-106 units were also used as security droids by a group of slicers on the planet Lok to guard their building.

IG-106 assassin droids were non-player characters in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. IG-106 assassin droids were added to the game with the expansion Star Wars Galaxies: Trials of Obi-Wan, released on November 1, 2005.

With the release of the Chapter 6 on May 22, 2007, players could also buy an IG-106 costume from Storyteller vendors for 25,000 credits. The costume could then be used with a holoshroud to give the player the appearance of an IG-106 droid for a limited time.
